name: Emoji down - one tap game
description:
Best supercasual time killer game for all age group.Best parallex scrolling single tap game in google play store.A game made with single handed Tap.It is a Tap and Go concept.

The game needs no wifi to download preloaded assets.You can customise your smiley according to your desire and play however you want.It is best for children as well as youngpeople for killing time.

Features and Gameplay :

Tap to rotate the clouds. Try to balance the emoji on them and avoid falling. Collect coins to unlock other cute smileys!

- Addictive one-touch gameplay.

- Many cute smileys to unlock with coins.

- Easy to customize

- Leaderboards and achievements

Your rating, review and feedback are greatly appreciated!
